page.title: 18 PRESENT AND FUTURE CONTD.
page.content: {Employment.}Traditionally an area where many people prefer to be self-employed if possible and any new small businesses should be encouraged. There are very few labouring type of men left in the village. Something is needed to provide work for females. Recently many farms have gone out of milk production. {Carsington Reservoir.}This should be completed, made safe and seen to be safe to reassure local residents. Also this provides much needed employment. The Derbys. County Council and West Derbys. District Council see this project attracting tourism to offset the decline in quarry and agriculture industries in this district. {Sewage Works. }Modern, in good order and capable of taking more effluent. {Footpaths.}There are 30 in the Parish, 27 of which are clear.
